total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the cells that are surrounded by the number 8 in the input grid.
Q2: Replace the identified cells with the number 3.
Q3: Identify the 3x3 grid in the input that matches the pattern of the output in the examples.
Q4: Extract the 3x3 grid from the input that matches the pattern identified in Q3.

Q4: Replace the identified cells with the number 8.
Q5: Repeat the process until no more cells can be replaced.
